name: Italian Tuna Spread
author: JBrown
summary: This is part of an antipasti spread. Serve with crostini, Melba toast, or crackers at room temperature. Store in refrigerator covered. To reuse, bring back to room temperature. Do not microwave to reheat. It will turn to goop. Best tuna fish sandwich you will ever have. Use iceberg lettuce, toasted bread, and thin slice of tomato. Yum!
ingredients: 3 (4.5 ounce) cans tuna packed in olive oil, drained
½ cup unsalted butter at room temperature
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Blend tuna, butter, capers, parsley, lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a food processor until smooth
